metadata.title: CVE-2021-30158 mediawiki: blocked users are unable to use Special:ResetTokens (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: In mediawiki a blocked users are not able to use Special:ResetTokens. If such user shared a token (accidentally or not) then it wasn't possible to block any potential future use of the compromised token. 
            STATEMENT: The mediawiki package was removed from OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) in version 4.3, therefore for OCP 4 has been marked as out of support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
mediawiki is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
